patthana1.17:1.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:2.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.17:3.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:4.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:5.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:6.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:7.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:8.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:9.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:10.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:11.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:12.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:13.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:14.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:15.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:16.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:17.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:18.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.17:19.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:21.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:22.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:23.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:24.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:25.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukādhipati.
patthana1.17:26.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:27.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:28.1_1: Maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:29.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:30.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:31.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:32.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:33.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:34.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:35.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:36.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko adhipati.
patthana1.17:37.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati adhipati.
patthana1.17:38.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naadhipatipaccayā—maggahetuke ca maggādhipatī ca khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca adhipati.
patthana1.17:39.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā …
patthana1.17:40.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:41.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:42.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:43.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:44.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā— maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:45.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggādhipatiṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:46.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:47.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggādhipatī tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:48.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipatī ca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:49.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā cetanā.
patthana1.17:50.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:51.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca maggārammaṇā ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:52.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetukā cetanā.
patthana1.17:53.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:54.1_0: Maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti nakammapaccayā—maggahetuke khandhe paṭicca maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca cetanā.
patthana1.17:55.1_0: Maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā— maggādhipatī khandhe paṭicca maggādhipati cetanā.
patthana1.17:56.1_0: Maggārammaṇañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
patthana1.17:57.1_0: Maggahetukañca maggādhipatiñca dhammaṁ paṭicca maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā.
patthana1.17:58.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā. (Paripuṇṇaṁ.)
patthana1.17:59.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā— ahetukaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.17:60.1_0: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā.
patthana1.17:61.1_0: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke sattarasa, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte sattarasa.
patthana1.17:63.1_0: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā sattarasa, napurejāte sattarasa, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane nava, nakamme sattarasa, navipāke navippayutte sattarasa.
patthana1.17:65.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṁ, anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ …pe…
patthana1.17:65.1_1: jhāne sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.17:68.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:69.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— maggārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ maggādhipatīnaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:70.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:71.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, maggahetukā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:72.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:73.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:74.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:75.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, maggādhipatī khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:76.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:77.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena maggahetukamaggādhipaticittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, maggahetukā ca maggādhipatī ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:78.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggādhipatissa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:79.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:80.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:81.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:82.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:82.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggārammaṇādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:83.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:84.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:85.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:85.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:86.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:86.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:87.1_0: Maggahetuko dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:87.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggahetukādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:88.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggādhipatissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:88.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:89.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:89.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:89.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:90.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:90.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:91.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.17:91.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.17:91.1_2: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggārammaṇānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:92.1_0: Maggādhipati dhammo maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:92.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—maggādhipati adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ maggāhetukānañca maggādhipatīnañca khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.17:110.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…

patthana1.17:133.1_2: Nava pañhā kātabbā, āvajjanā na kātabbā.)
patthana1.17:134.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā …pe….
patthana1.17:135.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.17:135.1_5: atthipaccayena paccayo (ime satta paccayā sattarasa pañhā hetusadisā) …
patthana1.17:136.1_0: Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:138.1_0: Maggārammaṇo dhammo maggārammaṇassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …

patthana1.17:157.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggārammaṇassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.17:158.1_0: Maggahetuko ca maggādhipati ca dhammā maggahetukassa ca maggādhipatissa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.17:159.1_0: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe sattarasa (naārammaṇe gahite pakatārammaṇampi upanissayārammaṇampi dvepi chijjanti), naadhipatiyā ekavīsa, naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate ekavīsa.
patthana1.17:161.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe sattarasa, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate sattarasa.
patthana1.17:163.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe sattarasa, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye ekavīsa, āsevane nava, kamme sattarasa, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sampayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate sattarasa.
